Final Year Project application, designed and built by Thomas Fox. The aim is to provide students will real time notifications about nearby discounts in their favourite stores.
How to view discounts?
Go to the menu button in the top left of the screen, and select Discounts. From here you can now see and view all discounts available.
How to turn off notifications?

Select the menu button in the top left and choose settings. From here you can tap the toggle switch to turn off notifications for selected categories. There is also the option to turn all notifications off.
How to find my location?

By going to the map page via the menu, you can select the pointer button that appears in the top right of the screen and it will zoom into your location. If you are near any shops with a discount, they will appear with a red pin on them.
